name: Wen-Hsaing Shih
body:
## Contacts

* Email: shih777577@gmail.com
* [Linkedin](https://tw.linkedin.com/in/swhisnag)

## About Shih Wen-Hsiang
I'm a back-end developer also an entrepreneur. I am familiar with B2B software market and have pushed a digital product Agilearning to enterprise market with three partners and got two paying customers. Helped a B2B company to get a 3 million NT dollar contract by my skill of deployment.

Skills:
- Node.js, Python, Golang.
- MongoDB, Postgres

### Experiences

* Software developer (Back-end)
#### [Kaneoh](http://www.garageplus.asia/zh/node/964), enterprise solution, 2015/11 - 2016/8
  * Design and implement a message system which can let people communicate across the intranet. The dependencies of the message system are nodejs, nsq(queue), AWS S3.
  * A [Slack robot](http://i.imgur.com/CfiQOpT.png) which can listen command from slack channel and automatically deploy. Written by python.

* Back-end developer
#### [Agilearning](http://agilearning.io/), online coding environment hosting service, 2014/12 - 2015/02
Deployed Agilearning to Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, and Linode. Managed dozens of servers and containers.  Also wrote the shell script to automatically deploy service. Collaborated with three partners and brought the product to market in three months.
[Prototype Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f1IAuMTUD2k)

* Teaching Assistant
#### [Taiwan Coder League](http://entresoft.org/), student coding group, 2014/09 - 2015/02
TWCL is a nonprofit organization. Founders of TWCL believe that "Software eating the world. Coding is important as same as Math, English, and Science." I joined this project as a teaching assistant and helped more than dozen students debug while they were building their website.

### Talks

* [GraphQL](https://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/229861960/), Meteor Taipei Meetup, April 19 2016
[Slides](http://goo.gl/U61nk2)

* [MUPX meets Docker](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/227983104/), Meteor Taipei Meetup, January 26, 2016
[Slides](http://slides.com/swhsiang/deck-7)

Deploy meteor application by Docker.

* [Test Meteor on Travis](http://www.meetup.com/Meteor-Taipei/events/226366012/), Meteor Taipei Meetup, Nov 18, 2015
[Slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1aqIR_NUdfVjbgRUUzCoMz74togrMZQ4yVQE03DfXhNw/edit?usp=sharing)

Set up the CI environment of Meteor application.
### Education

* #### Department of Communications Engineering, 
Feng Chia University, 2012 - 2014 undergraduate

* #### National Dali Senior High School
2009 - 2012
